Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special-order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
Prices reflected in this email may differ if you are an account holder. If you have an account, sign In to view your pricing. Your price may be different from the price displayed. Prices are subject to change. Offer valid at www.grandandtoy.com only and one per ship to address. Open to Canadian residents only. Offer valid while quantities last.
